title: Bob Hall
text:
Welcome. I am a river ecosystem ecologist at Flathead Lake Bio Station, University of Montana.
Publications
CV

 Robert O. Hall, Jr.

title: Stream Ecology Class
text:
This class is a field-based exploration of sites along the Middle Fork Flathead River. Students spend 4 days floating and camping along the river The following week we analyze samples and data and write a paper. Students from any college can take this class. You will get wet! And maybe hear a wolf howl.
Class and enrollment information



Bonecrusher Rapid

title: Bob Hall
text:
Ecological Models and Data
is a graduate class in learning to fit custom models from your discipline to data using Bayesian inference.
